text: The Vanishing (, literally: "Traceless" or "Without a Trace") is a 1988 Dutch- French thriller movie directed by George Sluizer and adapted by the novella The Golden Egg by Tim Krabb√©. It stars Bernard-Pierre Donnadieu, Gene Bervoets, Johanna ter Steege, Gwen Eckhaus. It was remade in 1993. ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 thriller movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Dutch thriller movies Category:Movies directed by George Sluizer
title: The Vanishing (1988 movie)
